people.name: Mehran Ebrahimi
people.title: Associate Professor, Faculty of Science, Ontario Tech
people.research: Machine learning, Artificial intelligence and its applications to medical image analysis; Mathematical imaging and inverse problems; Developing and validating efficient numerical methodologies for solving real-world, ill-posed inverse problems in the field of medical imaging.
people.description:
Education

Postdoctoral Fellowship: Dept. of Medical Biophysics, University of Toronto, Imaging Research, Sunnybrook Health Sciences Centre (2008-2013)
PhD: Department of Applied Mathematics, University of Waterloo, Waterloo, Ontario, Canada (2003-2008)

people.title: Graduate Student - PhD

people.description: Thesis: Computational Methods for Medical Image Registration, Mia actively collaborated with Dr. Mihaela Pop (Sunnybrook research institute), Ontario Trillium Scholar winner.

people.description:
Thesis: Mathematical Methods for 2D-3D Cardiac Image Registration, Lorraine won the people’s choice award at the 2016 Three Minute Thesis (3MT®).
She joined the University of Auckland, New Zealand, as an exchange student in Fall 2016 on a Queen Elizabeth II Diamond Jubilee Scholarship.
